name: Abyss Script - Romantic Terror
text: Return 1 "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster you control to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon from your Extra Deck in Defense Position, 1 face-up "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster with a different original name from that monster. If this Set card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect, and you have a face-up "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster in your Extra Deck: You can Set any number of "Abyss Script" Spells directly from your Deck. You can only activate 1 "Abyss Script - Romantic Terror" per turn.
